default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: The crimson full moon rises... You used the unknown to catch me... You... are the black hole of secrets I long for.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Have you... solved the inscrutable riddle about me?

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Break all the shackles and peer into my deepest secrets.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: There's nothing I wish to seek here.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: This mission... might be worth something, but barely...

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: This mission has become meaningless. Don't waste any more time...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: The red heat shall devour everything!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: The stars... shall ultimately die in darkness.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: No, no... Argh! I-is that you? Oh good... you came.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: I want... I want to unearth all the unknowns of the world, and watch as 100 billion suns collapse into black holes of doom...

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Quick... hurry. Let me go seek and explore and research and devour all the secrets... until they completely vanish from my consciousness.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: It's howling and tormenting me... and pushing me to get all your secrets...

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Me...? I survived by devouring secrets of the unknown... Yeah, that's all...

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I shall always remember... how that red star fell into the sea... It brought forth endless knowledge, secrets, affairs and mysteries... Ah, how intriguing it is.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I went to that place in search of the unknown... It really satisfies me, but I think, you can make me feel the same way.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Quantum fields attract and distort space-time, while you and your secrets... attract me... I can't help but be drawn to you, and fall... I cannot escape, yet... I have no regrets.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Instead of lingering by my side, why not come a bit closer...

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: No need to tell me what this move means... I don't want to know.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: It's extremely dangerous to gaze at the Black Hole... It won't respond to you. It'll just rip you apart and devour you...

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: I don't want to be too far away from you.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: The things that are already known to human are worthless.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Push the limits.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Do you also want to break through mankind's greatest defenses and peek into their secrets?

default.title: Deploy
default.text: If you want to use me, be careful.

cosmic_escapist.title: Obtain Attire
cosmic_escapist.text: This is a gathering of the stars... In this vast emptiness, the only ones attending the feast are me... and you...

cosmic_escapist.title: Greeting
cosmic_escapist.text: Climb up the stairs and join me... If you stop just for these bouquets, you'll miss out on the spectacular view of the starry sky...

cosmic_escapist.title: Ordinary Contact 1
cosmic_escapist.text: That celestial body encircling us is the mere shadow of the same star... A black hole hides it well by warping and refracting the light... But now, I'll guide you to fully perceive its existence.

cosmic_escapist.title: Ordinary Contact 2
cosmic_escapist.text: The stars converge in the cosmos, and I yearn to uncover all their secrets... Even if it means becoming one of them, torn apart for closing the distance... I simply can't resist...

cosmic_escapist.title: Idle
cosmic_escapist.text: It's getting closer... The red full moon...

cosmic_escapist.title: Annoyed
cosmic_escapist.text: If you wish to get closer to me, instead of tangling with my hem, why don't you... tell me your secrets.

cosmic_escapist.title: Special Attention
cosmic_escapist.text: Are you looking upon this sea of stars... or are you looking... at me?

cosmic_escapist.title: Level Up
cosmic_escapist.text: The more the stars burn, the brighter they shine...
